TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CreateUserWizardStep extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.TemplatedWizardStep
Public NotInheritable Class CreateUserWizardStep Inherits TemplatedWizardStep

summary.span: 包含用于在可以模板化的步骤中创建用户的基本功能。

span.span: Contains basic functionality for creating a user in a step that can be templated.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控件在网站的用户数据存储区中创建新的用户帐户。The control creates new user accounts in a Web site's user data store. 默认情况下，是控件中的第一步 。The is, by default, the first step within the control. 步骤是控件中的必需步骤 。The step is a required step within the control. 类派生自 类。The class is derived from the class. 穦 控制之前步骤。The is displayed in the control before the step. > [!NOTE] > 尽管此 步骤是默认情况下向导中的第一步，但也可以提供不同的第一步。Although the step is the first step in the wizard by default, it is possible to provide a different first step. 但这样做会影响是否显示 " **上一步** " 按钮。Doing so, however, can affect whether the **Previous** button is displayed. 例如，如果该 步骤没有自定义导航模板，且前面有一个之前呈现的另一个步骤，则在 运行时该步骤中将显示 " **上一** 步" 按钮 。For example, if the step does not have a custom navigation template, and is preceded by another step that is rendered before , then the **Previous** button is displayed on the step at run time. 如果在 备用 "first" 步骤之前呈现该步骤，则不会显示 " **上一** 步" 按钮。If the step is rendered before the alternate "first" step, then the **Previous** button is not displayed. 此外，不会在设计时呈现 " **上一步** " 按钮。Furthermore, the **Previous** button is never rendered at design time. 如果希望在设计时呈现 " **上一** 步" 按钮，则必须将其添加到步骤的自定义导航模板 。If you want the **Previous** button to be rendered at design time, you must add it to the custom navigation template of the step. 您可以 通过编辑与控件关联的模板来修改包含其他字段的步骤，或者更改步骤中包含的字段的显示顺序。You can modify the step to contain additional fields, or change the display order of the fields included in the step, by editing the template associated with the control. 当用户单击步骤中的 " **下一步** " 按钮时，将在数据存储区中创建新的网站用户帐户 。The new Web site user account is created in the data store when the user clicks the **Next** button on the step. 默认情况下， 属性设置为， `false` 以防止用户返回到 步骤，并意外尝试使用相同的凭据创建另一个用户帐户。By default, the property is set to `false` to keep the user from returning to the step and accidentally attempting to create another user account with the same credentials. 如果将属性设置 为 `true` ，则必须在应用程序中包括逻辑以删除最初在用户返回到此步骤之前创建的用户帐户，或者允许用户编辑其最初输入的信息。If you set the property to `true`, you must include logic in your application to remove the user account that was originally created before the user returned to this step, or to allow the user to edit information he or she originally entered. ## Examples 第一个代码示例使用类的短格式声明性语法 将其他控件添加到 控件。The first code example uses the short-form declarative syntax of the class to add an additional control to a control. 此代码示例需要 Web.config 文件中的以下条目。The code example requires the following entries in the Web.config file. `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` `` > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). [!code-aspx-csharp[CreateUserWizardCreatedUser#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardCreatedUser/CS/createuserwizardcreatedusercs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CreateUserWizardCreatedUser#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardCreatedUser/VB/createuserwizardcreateduservb.aspx#1)] > [!IMPORTANT] > 此控件具有接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This control has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 网页中的用户输入可能包含恶意的客户端脚本。User input in a Web page can potentially contain malicious client script. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入，以确保输入不包含 HTML 元素或脚本。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate user input to ensure that the input does not contain HTML elements or script. 只要启用了此验证，就不需要在用户输入中显式检查脚本或 HTML 元素。As long as this validation is enabled, you do not need to explicitly check for script or HTML elements in user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)). 第二个代码示例列出了完整的 控件。The second code example lists the complete control. [!code-aspx-csharp[CreateUserWizardStep#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardStep/CS/createuserwizardstepcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[CreateUserWizardStep#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/CreateUserWizardStep/VB/createuserwizardstepvb.aspx#1)] > [!IMPORTANT] > 此控件具有接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This control has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 网页中的用户输入可能包含恶意的客户端脚本。User input in a Web page can potentially contain malicious client script. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入，以确保输入不包含 HTML 元素或脚本。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate user input to ensure that the input does not contain HTML elements or script. 只要启用了此验证，就不需要在用户输入中显式检查脚本或 HTML 元素。As long as this validation is enabled, you do not need to explicitly check for script or HTML elements in user input. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100))。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/w1sw53ds(v=vs.100)).

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否允许用户从 控件中的后一个步骤返回到当前步骤。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the user is allowed to return to the current step from a subsequent step in a control.

value.span: 如果允许用户返回 步骤，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user is allowed to return to the step; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 将 属性设置为， `false` 以防止用户返回到 步骤，并且无意中尝试创建具有相同凭据的另一个用户帐户。The property is set to `false` to keep users from returning to the step and accidentally trying to create another user account with the same credentials. 如果重写 属性并将其设置为 `true` ，则应在应用程序中包含逻辑，以删除最初在用户返回到此步骤之前创建的用户帐户，或者允许用户编辑其最初输入的信息。If you override the property and set it to `true`, you should include logic in your application to remove the user account that was originally created before the user returned to this step, or to allow the user to edit information he or she originally entered.

span.span: An attempt was made to set the property.

summary.span: 获取或设置为 控件的 步骤显示的用户界面 (UI) 的类型。

span.span: Gets or sets the type of user interface (UI) to display for the step of a control.
The enumeration value of the enumeration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性指定要为控件的用户帐户创建步骤显示的导航选项 。The property specifies the navigation options to display for the user-account-creation step of the control. 属性确定控件 上显示控件的哪个导航按钮 。The property determines which of the control's navigation buttons are displayed on the control. 有关更多信息，请参见 属性。For more information, see the property. > [!CAUTION] > 如果尝试将 属性更改为枚举值以外的任何值 ，则 将引发。If you attempt to change the property to any value other than the value of the enumeration, an will be thrown. 无法通过主题或样式表主题设置此属性。This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [ASP.NET 主题和外观](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/ykzx33wh(v=vs.100)).

exception.span: 尝试将 属性设置为 枚举值以外的值。

span.span: An attempt was made to set the property to a value other than the enumeration value.

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件的用户帐户创建步骤的标题。

span.span: Gets or sets the title to use for the user-account-creation step of the control.

value.span: 控件的用户帐户创建步骤的标题。

span.span: The title to use for the user-account-creation step of the control.
The default value is "Sign up for your new account."

value.span: 控件的默认文本根据服务器当前的区域设置进行本地化。

span.span: The default text for the control is localized based on the server's current locale.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 设置此属性后，可以使用设计器工具自动将此属性的值保存到资源文件中。The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool. 有关详细信息，请参阅 和 [全球化和本地化](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100))。For more information, see and [Globalization and Localization](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/c6zyy3s9(v=vs.100)).
